types:type.name: post-sapi-request-payload
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type post_sapi_request_payload = {| email: String, firstName: String, lastName: String, manager_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, addrese: {| street: String, city: String |}, dob: String, updated_at: String, initials: String |} {"example": "{\\\"email\\\":\\\"kruno@net.hr\\\",\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"kruno\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"kra\\\",\\\"manager_id\\\":1,\\\"addrese\\\":{\\\"street\\\":\\\"Vukovarska 120\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Vinkovci\\\"},\\\"dob\\\":\\\"08\\/08\\/1988\\\",\\\"updated_at\\\":\\\"2021-11-26 12:27:16\\\",\\\"initials\\\":\\\"KK\\\"}"}

type post_papi_request_payload = {| emailAdresse: String, vorname: String, nachname: String, "manager-EmailAdresse": String, "straÃŸe": String, Geburtsort: String, Geburtstag: String |} {"example": "{\\\"emailAdresse\\\":\\\"kruno@net.hr\\\",\\\"vorname\\\":\\\"kruno\\\",\\\"nachname\\\":\\\"kra\\\",\\\"manager-EmailAdresse\\\":\\\"mario@net.hr\\\",\\\"stra\u00DFe\\\":\\\"Vukovarska 120\\\",\\\"Geburtsort\\\":\\\"Vinkovci\\\",\\\"Geburtstag\\\":\\\"586994400\\\"}"}
